name: OpenCanvas
tagline: A collection of our open source projects
body:
### Welcome to OpenCanvas open source portal!
In case you are here by accident, we remind you that [OpenCanvas][1] is an innovative platform for managing rich content and creating beautiful location based mobile apps with it.

Here we host a collection of open source projects that may aid you, in case you choose to create your own apps using the [OpenCanvas API][2], instead of using the web version of the platform.

### Projects
For now, we only showcase a collection of sample applications that demonstrate the usage of the OpenCanvas API. You can find the sample projects in the respective repositories for iOS, Android and Javascript.

* [iOS sample project][3]
* [Android sample project][4]
* [Javascript sample project][5]

### Authors and Contributors
Stratos Theodorou (@eeVoskos), Wojtek Whowanski (@wojer), Kostas Dimitros (@cjd1884)

### Support or Contact
Still having trouble? Check out the OpenCanvas documentation at http://opencanvas.co/developers. You will also find there information about how to contact us!

[1]: http://opencanvas.co
[2]: http://opencanvas.co/developers
[3]: https://github.com/OpenCanvas/sample-ios
[4]: https://github.com/OpenCanvas/sample-android
[5]: https://github.com/OpenCanvas/sample-javascript
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
